posts.title: Implementing FluentValidation with ASP.NET Core
posts.body: FluentValidation for me is a validation framework that enable readability and more cleaner code into our application. There are predefined set of rules that already predefined from the framework that using Lambda Expression which makes the framework more readable and very neat. For this post, we will create ASP.NET Core WebApi Project. Configure The Project…

posts.title: Extension for Cleaner Code
posts.body: Extension method in C#, VB or F# is a static method that accept this modifier of TInput. The method can be either void or return value. From MSDN definition, Extension methods enable you to "add" methods to existing types without creating a new derived type, recompiling, or otherwise modifying the original type. Extension methods are …

posts.title: Dependency Injection: SimpleInjector
posts.body: Dependency Injection is a pattern that already proven to make ease our development. I remember a quote that you sure already heard: "Program to an interface not an implementation". Why is it important to rely on interface instead of the implementation class? The answer is we can refactor it anytime without breaking all the class. …
